high_descs: Turn around and go to the sink behind you.
Take the rag from in the sink.
Turn around and to the left to go to the tub.
Place the rag in the tub, near the drain.
anns.task_desc: Put a rag in the tub.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the sink.
Turn left an walk to the tub.
Put the black rag in the tub.
anns.task_desc: Put a black rag in a tub.

high_descs: Grab the cloth from the sink
Turn left, walk to the tub
Put the cloth in the tub
anns.task_desc: Move the cloth from the sink to the tub
